sect1.title: Adding the LFS User
sect1.para: When logged in as user root, making a single mistake can damage or destroy a system. Therefore, we recommend building the packages in this chapter as an unprivileged user. You could use your own user name, but to make it easier to set up a clean work environment, create a new user called lfs as a member of a new group (also named lfs) and use this user during the installation process.
